wikipedia_page.main: Hugh Peter Turner (12 May 1917 – 1992), also known as Hughie Turner, was an English footballer who played as a full back in the Football League for Darlington.

response: Hugh Turner (6 August 1904 – 1996) was a professional footballer who played as a goalkeeper mainly for Huddersfield Town.
* Hugh Turner (footballer, born 1904) (1904–?), English Huddersfield Town goalkeeper football player
* Hugh Turner (footballer, born 1917) (1917–1992), English Darlington full back football player
